com.core.adnsdk

Interface RecyclerAdRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecyclerBannerAdRenderer, RecyclerCardAdRenderer

    public interface RecyclerAdRenderer
    RecyclerAdRenderer defines interfaces of operating AdViews for RecyclerView, such as Banner, Card, etc.
    Since:
    2016-03-28

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanAdView(android.view.View view, AdObject adObject)
      Clean AdView.
      android.view.View createAdView(android.app.Activity activity, android.view.ViewGroup parent, AdBaseSpec baseSpec)
      Create AdView.
      void init(android.app.Activity activity)
      Init renderer.
      void loadingAdView(android.view.View view, AdObject adObject)
      Loading AdView.
      void release()
      Release renderer.
      void renderAdView(android.view.View view, AdObject adObject, java.util.ArrayList<android.view.View> interactView, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,android.graphics.Bitmap> maps)
      Render AdView.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(android.app.Activity activity)
        Init renderer. User is capable of doing some initialization of data in global area used or shared by all AdViews.
        Parameters:
        activity - The context of AdView.

      • createAdView

        android.view.View createAdView(android.app.Activity activity,
                             android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                             AdBaseSpec baseSpec)
        Create AdView. User needs to create layout of an AdView either by inflating xml or building layout in code.
        Parameters:
        activity - The context of AdView.
        parent - The view parent od an AdView.
        Returns:
        The root view of AdView.

      • loadingAdView

        void loadingAdView(android.view.View view,
                 AdObject adObject)
        Loading AdView. SDK needs to make sure rendering an AdView won't block out main thread, so SDK requires an loading view before it displays AdView.
        Parameters:
        view - The root view of AdView.
        adObject - The Ad resources of AdView.

      • renderAdView

        void renderAdView(android.view.View view,
                AdObject adObject,
                java.util.ArrayList<android.view.View> interactView,
                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,android.graphics.Bitmap> maps)
        Render AdView. User could dynamically customize AdView by changing its visibility, layout, or data.
        Parameters:
        view - The root view of AdView.
        adObject - The Ad resources of AdView.
        interactView - User requires to specify views needed to get interaction, such as call to action button.
        maps - SDK uses maps to notify user Ad resources are ready, such as bitmaps of main, icon, cover images.

      • cleanAdView

        void cleanAdView(android.view.View view,
               AdObject adObject)
        Clean AdView. User requires to clean up the resources of views in an AdView. If user used VideoPlayer of SDK, please make sure the VideoPlayer.clean() is called here.
        Parameters:
        view - The root view of AdView.
        adObject - The Ad resources of AdView.

      • release

        void release()
        Release renderer.
